title: Back-End
text: Experienced in both functional and OOP: Python, PHP, C#, JavaScript, and TypeScript. MVC & MVT frameworks, Flask, Django, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Symphony, and Express. REST, Relational Databases, GIT, CI/CD, and Serverless Microservices.

title: Machine Learning
text: Curent University of California San Diego Machine and Deep Learning Bootcamp student learning supervised & unsupervised maching learning, artificial intelligence, and anomaly detection with TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib and Pandas.

title: Front-End
text: Ten+ years of UI/UX development experience in HTML, CSS, JS, + more recent React, Vue, Flutter and NextJS frameworks. I spent the first four years of my career building maintaining the front end design tools for over eight thousand websites built in classic .ASP.
